archimate:Requirement.name: BA.1.3.4: The integrity of information processed and output by business applications should be confirmed by checking against external sources (e.g. by reconciling bank statements; comparing against order processing logs, customer/supplier records or physical stock; or by performing plausibility checks to ensure output is reasonable).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
